creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Created attachment 27534
Thread dump

Hello,
I faced an issue with JMX Test plan of 51827.
I ran it, and then selected a node in Results View and JMeter totally blocked.

I made a Thread dump attached.
It seems to be a bug in MAC JVM:
"AWT-EventQueue-0" prio=6 tid=101bda000 nid=0x12af01000 runnable [12aefe000]

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
The workaround to this is to comment in jmeter.properties:
#jmeter.laf.mac=System

This seems to proves that it's a JVM MAC issue but confirmation would be nice.
Maybe this should be put in JMeter known issues because it's really violent.

Regards
Philippe

Created attachment 27535
Test Plan for which issue occured
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
Did you select the node whilst the test was still running, or did you wait until the test had finished?

Which build of JMeter did you use? 
If it was nightly (or built from SVN) please specify the revision number.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
I waited for test to end.
Yes nightly, revision 1172505.

Regards
Philippe

Hello,
I tested issue also occurs on 2.4 and 2.5.
Didn't test below.

Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com

text:
Hello,
I upgraded to last version of JDK6, Issue is fixed with it.
So I close the issue.

Regards
Philippe
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
sebb@apache.org
text: OK, thanks. Glad that has been sorted!
